entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Strathroy
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:08 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 12:00 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: -0.4°C
Wind: E 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or drizzle. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening with 60 percent chance of drizzle late this evening and after midnight. Rain beginning after midnight. Fog patches developing early this evening and dissipating after midnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain at times heavy. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending early in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain or drizzle. Risk of a thunderstorm in the morning and early in the afternoon. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023
